name: DungeonCrawler (Lairdom)
description:
This is a short concept demo of an unnamed work in progress title. It is inspired by earlier Legend of Zelda titles. This demo is a very early look of gameplay. 

How To Play:
Movement - Left Stick & WASD
Attack - X button, Mouse 1 & Keyboard E
Examine - A button & Keyboard F
Use Item - B button, Mouse 2 & Keyboard Spacebar
ChangeItem - Y button & Keyboard Q
Quit Game - Select button & Keyboard Esc

This concept demo was solo developed using ready made assets during Bootti GameDev Academy course, with Dungeon Crawler being the theme.
